briefTitle: Modifications of Immune Microenvironment Induced by Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Triple-negative BC
officialTitle: Study of the Modifications of the Immune Microenvironment Induced by Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Triple-negative Breast Cancers
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Identify Change of immune ME by TILS quantification of triple-negative breast cancer induced by neoadjuvant chemotherapy for all patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Samples from triple negative BC patients, patients treated by neoadjuvant chemotherapy ( FEC or EC than taxanes) Patients consent to use their samples.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Samples not available before or after neoadjuvant chemotherapy
